name: Buzzsaw Blitz
description:
Slice your enemy to pieces, but watch your own neck!

Made for the disc room game jam.

Controls:

wasd / arrow keys to move

mouse to aim, left click to fire

The font is m3x6 by Daniel Linssen: https://managore.itch.io/m3x6

Some of the sound effects are modified versions of those generously provided for the jam by doseone.

I wish I'd spent more time on this game, but as it is it's got some nice pieces.
